name: Great Star Ascendent
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Aim
  • X release: Switch between magic missiles (red hat) and laser (blue hat). (Laser can only be activated when energy bar is full!)
  • X hold: Fire current magic.
  • Z: Shift position away from reticle to dodge incoming foes!
  • Enter: Progress UI

See how big of a star you can ascend to!

The limitations of the fantasy console LTRO-1 were (very) loosely taken into consideration... The resolution is increased for web to 3X the LTRO-1's resolution... The music and sound effects are all outputs from Tiatracker, a sound emulator for the TIA sound chip (also used by the Atari 2600)... The colors almost exactly follow the 10 color palette of the LTRO-1. The control scheme fits the LTRO-1 controller (d-pad (arrow keys), A-button (Z), B-button (X), start-button (Enter))
